name: Building Relationships
description:
Welcome to this cozy little island where you find yourself as... a house? Explore the area, unlock abilities, go on a date, or go fishing! Talk to other buildings and form relationships... or don't? 

---------------------------------------

Controls:

AWSD to move

Tab - Inventory

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sh'move

E - Confirm/Interact

---------------------------------------

Q: Which version do I download?

A: Definitely the Version 1.0 unless you want to see what the game looks like immediately at the time of submission.

---------------------------------------

(Secret) Dog - https://pvgames.itch.io/medieval-town-and-country-interiors-bundle

Made in Unity
Cinemachine for Camera
Yarn for Dialogue
